creator: david__lux@hotmail.com
text:
1 - From a pdf generated with FOP i cannot copy paste to a word document, i use
the 0.20.5 version of FOP.

2 - From this same pdf i cannot save it as a doc file.

Some one can help me for this ?

Thanks in advance.

creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text: *** Bug 40082 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
This is due to the missing support for ToUnicode tables.
More info:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.20.5/fonts.html#embedding
and bug #5335

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5335 ***
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
